hold.name: Hold to Display
hold.hint: The key that needs to be held to display a token tooltip.

filter.name: Show Filter
filter.hint: When a tooltip sidebar is opened, you can use this keybind to display the filter field, scrolling to the top of the sidebar and giving focus to the field.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should the module be enabled on this client.

pips.name: Digital Pips
pips.hint: Use a digital representation of pips in the tooltip.

position.name: Tooltip Position
position.hint: Which side of the token would you prefer the main tooltip to show, if not possible, the module will try first on the opposite side, otherwise on one of the remaining two.

small-position.name: Small Tooltip Position
small-position.hint: Select a preferred side for the small version of the tooltip, same logic applies than for the regular one.

delay.name: Tooltip Delay
delay.hint: Delay in milliseconds before the main tooltip showing up on screen.

autolock.name: Auto Lock
autolock.hint: Should the tooltip get locked when hovering over it or as soon as it is rendered.

spells-sort.name: Sort Spells By
spells-sort.hint: How should the spell be sorted in a same table. They will still be sorted alphabetically as a second sorting.

scrollbar.name: Sidebar Scrollbar
scrollbar.hint: Should scrollbar be displayed on hud sidebars, if disabled, you will still be able to scroll but won't see the scrollbar anymore.

height.name: Sidebar Max Height
height.hint: Sets the sidebars max height, can be any css string used for a 'height' property (e.g. '50%' or '300px'). The module will make sure that the sidebars won't cross the limits of the viewport's height.

actions.name: Actions Sorting
actions.hint: How the actions should be sorted.

actions-colors.name: Strikes & Damages System Colors
actions-colors.hint: When enabled, the module will replicate the system color scheme of the strikes and damages buttons in the actor sheet.

distance.name: Distance to Token
distance.hint: Should the distance to selected/targeted token be displayed on the hud.

unit.name: Distance Unit
unit.hint: A string representing the multiplier, the unit and the number of decimals (all separated by commas) used when displaying the 'Distance To Token'. Example: '0.3, m, 2'. Leaving empty defaults to: '1, ft, 0',

status.name: Health Status
status.hint: Comma separated strings representing the different divisions of a creature's health state from worst to best (do not include "dead"). The module will divide the max health by the number of strings provided. Leave empty to disable.

last-status.name: Last Status at 100%
last-status.hint: When enabled, the last health status string will only be used for 100% instead of the last division of the health ratio.

see-status.name: Health Status on Owned
see-status.hint: When enabled, the health status will also be displayed on the regular tooltip instead of exclusively on non-owned ones.

untrained.name: Hide Untrained Skill Actions
untrained.hint: When enabled, skill actions that requires a minimum of being trained will not be shown in the skills sidebar.

tradition.name: Show Spell Tradition
tradition.hint: This will add the first letter of the tradition before the the spellcasting category.

actions-columns.name: Two Columns Actions
actions-columns.hint: When enabled, it will splits the actions sidebar into 2 columns.

items-columns.name: Two Columns Equipment
items-columns.hint: When enabled, it will splits the equipment sidebar into 2 columns.

spells-columns.name: Two Columns Spells
spells-columns.hint: When enabled, it will splits the spells sidebar into 2 columns.

skills-columns.name: Two Columns Skills
skills-columns.hint: When enabled, it will splits the skills sidebar into 2 columns.

show-death.name: Show Death Line
show-death.hint: Select if the dying and wounded line is displayed in the main tooltip.

player.hint: Which types of tokens require the keybind to be pressed/held to show their tooltip.

gm.hint: Show either no tooltips without holding the keybind or just the small version until pressed/held.

observer.name: Tooltip on Observe
observer.hint: When enabled, an uneditable version of the regular tooltip will be shown for tokens to which you have the 'observer' permission. Also, most of the features 'owned only' will now extend to 'observed' as well.

chat.name: Disable Chat Card Hover
chat.hint: Will prevent the tooltip to show up when hovering a chat card owned by a token.

party.name: Party as Observed
party.hint: Consider actors in the 'Party' alliance to be observed by players.

saves.name: Show Saves
saves.hint: Should the fortitude, reflex and will saves be displayed in the tooltip.

others.name: Perception, Stealth, Athletics
others.hint: Should the perception, stealth and athletics bonus/DC be shown in the tooltip.

ranks.name: Display Ranks
ranks.hint: When enabled, a little rank indicator will be added to the saves and others in the main tooltip.

tooltips.name: Disable Icons Tooltips
tooltips.hint: Disable all the icons tooltips in the main tooltip  from being shown.

scale.name: Scale by Font
scale.hint: You can scale the entirety of the tooltip and its attached sidebars/popup by changing its font size. The module was designed to be using a 14px font size by default.

hazard-width.name: Hazard Max Width
hazard-width.hint: This let you set the max width (in 'em') the hazard sidebar can take

force-speed.name: Force Highest Speed
force-speed.hint: When enabled, the default speed (when none manually selected) will always be the highest found on the actor instead of only if the land speed is 0.

filter.name: Always Show Filter
filter.hint: When enabled, the filter field will always be displayed at the top of sidebars instead of when using the 'Show Filter' keybind, the keybind still scroll to the top and gives focus to the field.

containers.name: Items in Containers
containers.hint: When enabled, items in containers will always be displayed in their container.

attack-close.name: Close Tooltip on Attack/Damage
attack-close.hint: Whenever you click on a strike/blast or damage/critical button, the tooltip will close.

cast-close.name: Close Tooltip on Spell Cast
cast-close.hint: Whenever you click on the cast-spell icon, the tooltip will close.

chat-close.name: Close Tooltip on Send-to-Chat
chat-close.hint: Whenever you click on a send-to-chat icon, the tooltip will close.

action-close.name: Close Tooltip on Action Use
action-close.hint: Whenever you click on a use-action button, the tooltip will close.

skill-close.name: Close Tooltip on Skill Roll
skill-close.hint: Whenever you click on an icon that rolls a skill check (perception checks included), the tooltip will close.

macro-close.name: Close Tooltip on Macro Use
macro-close.hint: Whenever you click on a use-macro button, the tooltip will close.

use-close.name: Close Tooltip on Item Use
use-close.hint: Whenever you click on a use-item button, the tooltip will close.

no-dead.name: No Tooltip on Dead NPCs
no-dead.hint: When enabled, the tooltip won't show up on dead NPCs.

action-effect.name: Auto Apply Action Effect
action-effect.hint: When enabled, usable actions will have their associated effect automatically applied on use.

rk-dice.name: Recall Knowledge - Die Roll
rk-dice.hint: When enabled, the format of the Recall Knowledge action will slightly change and show the die roll which makes it compatible with the Dice So Nice module.

spells.empty: {name} doesn't have any spells, magic is evil anyways.

extras.title: Extras
extras.empty: Nothing to see here, maybe some day.

actions.title: Actions
actions.empty: {name} doesn't have anything to do, how boring.

treat-wounds.title: {name} - Treat Wounds
treat-wounds.no-proficiency: {name} doesn't have the required proficiency to treat wounds.

resolve.title: Use Resolve Point
resolve.full: {name} is full of stamina and doesn't need to rest.

breather.label: Take a Breather
breather.msg: Rest for 10 minutes, spend a resolve point and regain all your stamina.
breather.used: {name} has {ratio} SP and spends a resolve point, taking a 10 minute breather. Stamina Refreshed.
